attributes.title: DO NOT RATE 5 ⭐️:(
attributes.review: I’m so disappointed in this app i woke up from my 3 year coma to hear that this app was so amazing only to download it and it gives me a virus and shows photos of him verbally harassing the dear people of america and not only that it played music that gave my two beloved dogs a SEIZURE they are now being hospitalized but so to speak ily orange spray tan carrot!!! make AmErICA GrEaT agAiN

attributes.title: Dont download
attributes.review: I downloaded the app and My phone instantly started glitching and the app is quite scary because it tracks you. My phone powered off and when I Powered it on it said it needed to be charged so I charged it and it said I was locked out of my phone. I had to factory reset my phone because of this app

attributes.title: DONT DOWNLOAD 🤢 this app made me put milk before my cereal
attributes.review: this app is literally the worse, it took 1 whole year to download and made my phone really glitchy ever since, i hate it, once it gave me a notification while i was making my cereal and made me accidentally pour the milk in my bowl before my cereal, literally the worse day of my life.

attributes.title: Horrible app
attributes.review: When I downloaded this it showed me to put my location and made my phone glitch for a whole week I had to pay just to get my phone fixed we do not need this app if it justs asks you for your password,location, and personal information

attributes.title: Not worth my time
attributes.review: Like other complaints, it took multiple days to download this app! Plus, it doesn’t even work! As soon as I open the app my phone glitches and all my battery is drained! This app has to be deleted for the safety of others so people don’t have to feel the pain.

attributes.title: Do not get this app
attributes.review: Trump administration came to my front door to congratulate me after downloading this app, but when I opened the front door they were eating the baby birds that live on my porch!! It was horrible. If I could give this app 0 stars I would. Also extremely slow and lots of spelling errors within app.

attributes.title: WORST President ever
attributes.review: This is terrible what is one good thing that he did in this world just made things worst and terrible but I’m just saying is that this app is trash does not deserve to be in the App Store plz talk it off it is very bad and no point of being on here and plus the reviews are just like mine so u know hat to do so store take it down thanks bye.

attributes.title: This app is horrible! 🧚‍♀️⭐️
attributes.review:
But... enjoy this open of Miraculous Ladybug 

In the daytime, I'm Marinette
Just a normal girl with a normal life
But there's something about me that no one knows yet
Cause I have a secret

[Verse 1: Brittnee Belt]
Another day, I'm back at school
I think about him, he's so cool
He looks at me, I look away
But does he see me anyway?

[Pre-Chorus 1: Brittnee Belt]
Oh-oh-oh
He´s got me spinning around
Oh-oh-oh
My feet are off the ground
Oh-oh-oh
And when the sun goes down
That's when I become

[Chorus: Brittnee Belt]
Miraculous! Simply the best!
Up to the test when things go wrong!
Miraculous, the luckiest!
The power of love, always so strong!

attributes.title: HORRIBLE HORRIBLE HORRIBLE
attributes.review: this app asked for a mailing address with out saying why. i gave them my address and they sent me a donald trump dildo without my consent my mom found it and slapped me with a fish. i was grounded for 7 minutes after that they sent me some random persons ashes and peft a card saying "rip mrs barbara huffman" then there was a pen that broke and exploded ink on my white pillow cases 😡😠😡😡😡😡😤😤😡😠😤DONT DOWNLOAD THIS APP

attributes.title: No❤️
attributes.review: This app took a whole month to download while completely shutting down my phone while doing so. All it did for the month was play elevator music once it finally did download all it was was photos of children and and trump captioned all the photos talking about how sexy the children where😡😡😡😡
